item.title: Nintendo Shares Drop $14bn Amid Chip Shortages
item.content:encoded:
A significant drop in Nintendoâ€™s share price on Wednesday wiped billions from the companyâ€™s value, amid growing concern over the surging price of components and memory chips.

Nintendoâ€™s share value dropped as much as 4.7 per cent on December 10, with the surging prices and shortages of key components, including memory chips, playing a major role.

Bloomberg reports the drop in Nintendoâ€™s share prices is the biggest since May, citing market intelligence firm TrendForce in stating that the price Nintendo has to pay for 12 GB RAM in the Switch 2 has jumped 41 per cent.

In December, Nintendoâ€™s shares have declined in seven of eight trading days, wiping around $14bn of value from the company, and the concern is that it could get worse.

While the Switch 2 has enjoyed an extremely popular launch period, aided by the releases of the likes of Mario Kart: World, the component situation in the market is becoming extremely problematic for Nintendo and other developers.

Nintendo may be forced to adjust prices for the Switch 2 console, with Dell and HP among those to have already warned that price rises could be on the cards in 2026.

With the large storage sizes of some of the biggest games, many players have sought to purchase additional storage for their devices, but the prices of those add-ons are already increasing.

In a market that is extremely sensitive to price increases, as shown by the backlash earlier this year to increases to an Xbox Game Pass subscription, it creates a worrying period for Nintendo and other console-building companies.

Do you think 2026 will see major price increases for devices, including Nintendo Switch 2? Share your thoughts in the Insider Gaming Discord.

For more news, read about the change Elon Musk wants to see in ARC Raiders, and take a look at the news that Kim Kardashian is coming to Fortnite.

item.title: Elon Musk Wants One Major ARC Raiders Change to Happen
item.content:encoded:
Thatâ€™s not a title you likely thought youâ€™d read today, but itâ€™s true. In a post on social media under a recent Embark Studios message, Elon Musk suggested a major change that could alter the core combat mechanics in ARC Raiders, the electrifying extraction adventure title released on October 30.

Elon Musk is a well-documented gamer who has participated in live streams on his X platform, but earlier this year, he openly admitted to â€˜cheatingâ€™ in games like Diablo and Path of Exile.

What does Elon Musk want to change in ARC Raiders?

Elon Wants to Hunt People

In his post on social media, Elon Musk, the eccentric entrepreneur and super-billionaire, wrote:

Good game.

A way to hunt players who have betrayed you would be ðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥

This gels with the recent arrival of a satirical â€˜Speranza Watchlistâ€™ that players could use to identify griefers and other abusive players in ARC Raiders. It was powered entirely by fake data, but it was humorous enough to get fans interested for a while about the concept of naming and shaming some of ARC Raidersâ€™ more troublesome users.

Elonâ€™s comment landed under a post from Embark Studios requesting feedback from the community regarding the ARC Raiders map pool. Of the five maps released thus far, a diverse array of opportunities is presented, but the environments available arenâ€™t without their fair share of issues.

Most notably, fans of the extraction adventure are still complaining about the exploits that allow players to phase through walls on certain maps.

In the past, Elon Musk has spoken about Elden Ring, Mass Effect, Diablo IV, Civilization, and BioShock, amongst others. Heâ€™s a self-professed â€˜living god of video gamesâ€™ and has boasted about being a â€˜top Quake playerâ€™ in his youth, carrying on his love for gaming as an adult and one of the richest people on Earth.

Are you surprised that Elon Musk is a fan of a game where an AI-driven robotic race oppresses humans everywhere? Let us know what you think about this story on the Insider Gaming Discord server.

item.title: Battlefield REDSECâ€™s $1 Million Tournament Has Been Postponed With No New Date
item.content:encoded:
Electronic Arts recently revealed an unprecedented Battlefield tournament with a $1 million prize pool. The REDSEC Elite Series was poised to be a new entrant into the battle royale esports space, contending with the likes of Call of Duty: Warzone. However, the team behind the tournament recently announced a postponement of the event and offered no new date.

In a post on social media, the team expressed their apologies and stressed that theyâ€™re still looking forward to fostering a competitive scene in Battlefield REDSEC thatâ€™s â€˜built to lastâ€™.

Battlefield REDSEC Elite Series Pushed Back

Battlefield REDSEC has been impacted by an â€˜unforeseen technical issueâ€™ that has warranted a sizeable delay on the event rolling out. This news was revealed in a recent social post from Electronic Arts and the teams organizing the $1 million tournament.

To our Battlefield REDSEC Elite Series community,

After a thorough review, due to an unforeseen technical issue that impacted the integrity of the competition, weâ€™ve made the difficult but necessary decision to postpone the Battlefield REDSEC Elite Series in all regions. We want to be upfront: this is on us.

Weâ€™re truly sorry for the disruption this causes. Your time, passion, and commitment have meant everything to this series, and we donâ€™t take that lightly.

We remain fully committed to the Battlefield REDSEC Elite Series and to creating a competitive scene thatâ€™s built to last. Weâ€™ll share more updates in the new year.

The tournament was supposed to run from December 10 â€“ 18, and the announcement came just as players were preparing to compete in their first Battlefield REDSEC tournament.

While Electronic Arts wasnâ€™t entirely clear on the reasons behind the delay, itâ€™s widely believed the game has too many technical issues that risk compromising the eventâ€™s integrity, such has been the case in recent years with Call of Duty: Warzone.

Fans were quick to comment. One user wrote, â€˜Thanks for the transparency and ownership. Weâ€™ll get there. This thing is still going to be epic.â€™ Another made a damning statement against the game, â€˜Your latest update broke the game. All of a sudden, hit registration is an issue.â€™

Tech-savvy gamers have dug into the issues and uncovered a memory leak problem associated with the latest Battlefield REDSEC build.

Were you planning to compete in the Battlefield REDSEC Elite Series tournament? Let us know on the Insider Gaming Discord server.

item.title: Kim Kardashian is Coming to Fortnite, and You Can Guess What Players Are Saying
item.content:encoded:
Itâ€™s official: Kim Kardashian is making her way into the multiverse of Fortnite as the latest celebrity collaboration. Hours ago, the socialite and entrepreneur revealed her skins with a post on social media, prompting many Fortnite players to make the obvious comments about the character model.

It seems that Epic Games has flouted earlier â€˜rulesâ€™ about not showing cleavage (amongst other things) in Fortnite, letâ€™s just say that.

When is Kim Kardashian Coming to Fortnite?

Kim Kardashian will join the Icon Series in Fortnite on December 13, with a lineup of three skins (with one modelled on SKIMS) being added to the store. The bundle will feature the three skins, all of which are â€˜highly customizableâ€™, a back bling, a glider, and an exclusive emote, which some have claimed is a bit too lascivious for a kidâ€™s game.

The depth of customization for the Kim Kardashian skins will allow players to alter her hairstyles and outfit colors.

Kim K confirmed her imminent arrival in Fortnite in a post on social media:

As you can imagine, players were quick to make their witty comments. One user wrote, â€˜Those are gonna be some sticky controllers,â€™ while another quipped, â€˜Maâ€™am, this is a childâ€™s game.â€™

Another commented on the fairly obvious issue with Fortniteâ€™s target audience: â€˜These young kids are about to mature real fast.â€™

For the earliest unlock possible, you can compete in the Kim Kardashian Icon Cup, which officially kicks off tomorrow, December 12:

What do you think? Are you going to invest in the Kim Kardashian Fortnite skins? Let us know on the Insider Gaming Discord server how desperate you are to acquire this sought-after bundle (or notâ€¦)

item.title: Sorcerer Battlegrounds Codes (December 2025)
item.content:encoded:
Use these Roblox Sorcerer Battlegrounds monthly redeem codes for December 2025 to get your hands on plenty of free rewards, including emotes and much more.

Inspired by Jujutsu Kaisen, Sorcerer Battlegrounds is the perfect Roblox game for players who want to combine the hit anime with their love for PvP fighting games. It throws players into the arena from the get-go, as they pick from characters inspired by anime and manga-style sorcerers. Each character comes with their own unique moves, skills, combos, magical attacks and more. From there, players start their PvP battles where the goal is simply to defeat other players using their skills and character with the help of their abilities in an attempt to climb up the ranking while racking up kills. 

The combat system rewards skilful play, as mastering the timing of your spells, understanding the strengths and weaknesses of different techniques, and learning effective combos is crucial for success. Thatâ€™ll help players become better because the more wins a player earns, theyâ€™ll unlock cosmetics, titles/grades (for ranked modes) and more.  While you can grind matches naturally, redeeming codes is a handy shortcut â€” sometimes the game developers release codes that give emotes, cosmetics, or freebies in the game.

Active Sorcerer Battlegrounds Codes

  • 0KFAVSTE2 â€“ Redeem the code to get milestone rewards
  • BUGOOOOO!713 â€“ Redeem the code to get two emotes
  • GREATEST_RETURN!503 â€“ Get 3 random emotes

Expired Sorcerer Battlegrounds Codes

  • MYFAULTT
  • /e !codeclaim MYFAULTT

How To Redeem Sorcerer Battlegrounds Codes

While redeeming codes in most Roblox games are straightforward, Sorcerer Battlegrounds is a little bit different as compared to other games. Hereâ€™s how to do it:

  1. Boot up Sorcerer Battlegrounds on Roblox.
  2. Look for the Codes NPC on the edge of the map and then interact with them.
  3. Select Yes to bring up the code redemption box.
  4. Enter the Code and click on submit to receive your rewards. 

How To Get More Sorcerer Battlegrounds Codes

Sorcerer Battlegrounds codes can usually be found on the gameâ€™s official Discord server, on the Roblox game page, and sometimes on the creator/developerâ€™s social media pages. That includes the official Roblox group, as the team drops codes during game milestones and special events. However, keeping track of the multiple sources can be time-consuming, especially with no notification system in place when the codes hit their expiration date.

Thus, we suggest bookmarking this guide in your browser, as we refresh it as soon as new Sorcerer Battlegrounds codes are released and remove expired codes once they are no longer valid.

Having fun using codes in Roblox games? Then check out the latest codes for The Forge, Merge And Fight, and Uma Racing. Join the Insider Gaming Discord community to stay up to date with the latest happenings in the gaming world.
